CustomField.description:
Sept 2019-C.Hoffart Aggregate of how many volunteer opportunities this person has completed. See other fields with similar name.
Note: For, Report Type = Volunteer Jobs with Shifts & Hours - Customizable, this field has a label of Repeat-Volunteer
The Report Type field properties for this field were modified to reduce the length of the original name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of volunteer opportunities the Contact has completed in this volunteer area.
CustomField.label: Repeating Genesis Gardens Volunteer
